title: Profiles In Soil Health: "Enhancing Soil Systems Utilizing Grazing Practices" With Steve Reimer

tasks.task: Discuss the evolution of cattle grazing practices on a family farm
subtasks: Explain the family's connection to the farm and the heritage of raising Hereford cattle
Describe the transition from large pastures to smaller "traps" for grazing
Outline the seasonal grazing plan based on different grass types
Mention the impact of unpredictable weather on farming practices
Highlight the importance of utilizing byproducts from cereal grain crops
Describe how cover crops and grazing cattle can enhance soil health
Emphasize the connection between microbial activity, water holding capacity, soil quality, and profitability
Address the farm's commitment to resilience and long-term sustainability
